biography_text: RIGGLEMAN, Denver, a Representative from Virginia; born in Manassas, Va., March 1, 1970; graduated from Stonewall Jackson High School, Manassas, Va., 1988; A.A., Burlington County College, Mount Laurel, N.J., 1996; A.A.S., Community College of the Air Force, Maxwell Air Force Base, Ala., 1996; B.A., University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va., 1998; United States Air Force, 1992-2007; federal contractor; small business owner; distillery operator; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
